Summary: brightly flashing lights that dipped real quick and then dissapeared
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fall River
There were no other sightings in Fall River on or around September 19th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting down in basement and I looked out the window and noticed what I at first thought was a plane and then reality set in and realized it could in no way of been a plane because of how bright the lights were flashing and going from side to side as if it was a circular shaped object. I sat there stunned and while trying to convince myself it was a plane it dropped down real quick (something a plane cannot do) It kept going along its path and then dissapeared, not behind trees or buildings but just plain dissapeared. This was a ufo, no doubt in my mind. I tried convincing myself differently but, it was not possible.
